channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12991] Use HBase 1.0 interfaces in hbase-rest
item.description: hbase-rest uses HTable and HBaseAdmin under the covers. They should use the new hbase 1.0 interfaces instead.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
+1 for the REST changes

This:


diff --git hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/util/ConnectionCache.java hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/util/ConnectionCache.java

index 21714af..8bcdda9 100644

--- hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/util/ConnectionCache.java

+++ hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/util/ConnectionCache.java

[...]

and this:


diff --git hbase-thrift/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/thrift/ThriftServerRunner.java hbase-thrift/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/thrift/ThriftServerRunner.java

index 9f23c09..2752a1a 100644

--- hbase-thrift/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/thrift/ThriftServerRunner.java

+++ hbase-thrift/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/thrift/ThriftServerRunner.java

[...]

are out of scope per the issue description. Or we can make this about replacing HBaseAdmin with Admin more generally. Perhaps sweep up more occurrences if there are any.

Anyway, I'm happy to commit the patch and resolve the issue as is minus the called out changes.
